mapper.sql: a.reply_id, a.user_id, a.experience_id, a.like_num, a.unlike_num, a.create_time, a.content, a.main_reply_id, a.parent_user_id, b.user_name, b.sex, b.head_image
mapper.insert: insert into reply( user_id, experience_id, like_num, unlike_num, content, main_reply_id, parent_user_id) values ( #{userId}, #{experienceId}, #{likeNum}, #{unlikeNum}, #{content}, #{mainReplyId}, #{parentUserId})
mapper.update:
update reply set
like_num=like_num+1
like_num=like_num-1
unlike_num=unlike_num+1
unlike_num=unlike_num-1
where reply_id=#{replyId}
mapper.select: select a.content, a.create_time as "createTime", a.like_num as "likeNum", a.unlike_num as "unlikeNum", a.user_id as "userId", b.name, b.head_image as "headImage" from reply a left join sys_user b on a.user_Id=b.user_Id where a.experience_id=#{experienceId} and main_reply_id='0'

select ,b1.user_name as parent_user_name from reply a left join sys_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id left join sys_user b1 on a.parent_user_id=b1.user_id where main_reply_id=#{mainRepluId} and main_reply_id!='0'
